Take notes: During conversations or meetings, taking notes can help remember important details.
Use memory aids: Techniques like association, visualization, and repetition can aid in memory retention.
Seek out other people: Talking to others who were also present during the event can help reinforce memories.
Take pictures: While not possible in this scenario, taking pictures can help remember people and places.
Keep souvenirs: Physical objects like tickets, postcards, or other memorabilia can serve as reminders of past events and people.
